head.title: Sum of the Parts Greater Than the Whole

hedline.hl1: Sum of the Parts Greater Than the Whole

abstract.p: T H Robsjohn-Gibbings show is at Eric Philippe in Paris; photo (S)

block.p: The antiques dealer Eric Philippe has a reputation as the first to catch trends. His T. H. Robsjohn-Gibbings show, closing this weekend, is the first solo exhibition of Robsjohn-Gibbings's work since his death in 1976. Most pieces came from Casa Encantada in Bel Air, Calif., and sold immediately. The pillars, right, were $100,000 a pair. Eric Philippe, 25 galerie Vero-Dodat, 011-33.142.33.28.26; also by fax, 011-33.1.42.21.17.93; or e-mail, ericphil@worldnet.fr.
